product_data.name: The Scotch Malt Whisky Society 1.292 - Rhythms Of The Soul 11 YO Single Malt Scotch Whisky
product_data.description: Bristol by the way of Ben Rinnes is an 11-year-old whisky from the Speyside region, matured in first-fill American oak PX and first-fill Spanish oak Oloroso Hogsheads.
product_data.nose_description: Delicious burnt caramel and hints of violets invite you in.
product_data.palate_description: The palate bursts with anise, spearmint, kumquat, and shortbread, while rich layers of fudge, oak, and vanilla unfold.
product_data.finish_description: A delightful finish lingers with honey and spice.

product_data.name: The GlenAllachie Distillers Co 10 YO Batch 12 Single Malt Scotch Whisky
product_data.description: The GlenAllachie 10 Year Old Cask Strength Batch 12 is a powerhouse Speyside single malt Scotch whisky created under the expert guidance of Master Distiller Billy Walker. This limited edition release showcases the intensity and craftsmanship behind its production.
product_data.nose_description: Opening up on slivers of marzipan, marshmallow and mocha, as well as charred oak, peanut skins and a good hit of nougat. Slivers of chestnuts too, but not very fruity, although there is a hint of crème de cassis and oxidized apple parts. Finally a sliver of Demerara sugar.
product_data.palate_description: The sweet toast of American oak. There’s very much a charred quality alongside oak spices, but then deep notes of butterscotch, toffee and toasted walnuts. Also nutmeg, cloves and molasses. The dried red fruits are outshined a bit.
product_data.finish_description: Medium to long. Slightly dry. Oak spices linger – there’s a soft herbaceous quality even. Then some dark caramel and mocha.

product_data.name: Ballantine's 10 YO Blended Scotch Whisky
product_data.description: COLOR Golden honey. NOSE Sweet honey with hints of oak and vanilla. TASTE Complex honey and floral flavors with a creamy oak sweetness. FINISH Long lasting, refreshing and sweet.
product_data.nose_description: Sweetness of honey and a well-balanced elegance
product_data.palate_description: Vanilla-like sweetness and a fresh apple-like impression
product_data.finish_description: A sweet, long aftertaste that continues to be refreshing
